spec_data.Name: php-simplepie
spec_data.Description:
SimplePie is a very fast and easy-to-use class, written in PHP, that puts the
'simple' back into 'really simple syndication'. Flexible enough to suit
beginners and veterans alike, SimplePie is focused on speed, ease of use,
compatibility and standards compliance.

Autoloader: /usr/share/php/php-simplepie/autoloader.php
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 09:11:41 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: A simple Atom/RSS parsing library for PHP
